Asteroid Module

Module to query data on asteroids from Gaia and plot transits and orbits

class asteroidal.asteroid.Asteroid(number_mp=0, denomination='', source_id=0)

An asteroid in Gaia.sso_source database with observations.

Asteroid object should be initialized with one of three inputs: number_mp, denomination, or source_id (if more than three are inputed, will prioritize initializing in given order). Initialization will query Gaia for the remaining attributes unless the asteroid does not exist in Gaia.

Parameters

  • source_id (int) – Unique source identifier from gaia_source.

  • number_mp (int) – Minor Planet number attributed by MPC.

  • denomination (string) – Name of asteroid in MPC database.

source_id

Unique source identifier from gaia_source.

Type

int

number_mp

Minor Planet number attributed by MPC.

Type

int

denomination

Name of asteroid in MPC database.

Type

string

num_of_obs

Number of observations for the asteroid that appear in sso_observation.

Type

int

observations

Table of observations from sso_observation. Includes source_id, observation_id, number_mp, epoch, ra, dec, x_gaia, y_gaia, z_gaia.

Type

table

transits

Array of individual transits from observation.

Type

ndarray of int

transit_ccds

Array of lists of ccd detectors activated for an observation for each transit.

Type

ndarray of list of int

mpc_data

All data from querying MPC.

Type

dict

orbit_data

Array of orbit data (eccentricity, semimajor axis) queried from MPC.

Type

ndarray of float

get_transit_obs(index)

Returns ra and dec of observations of a specific transit, specified by index in transits array

Parameters

index (int) – index of transits array

Returns

Returns list of ra and list of dec

Return type

list

plot_all_transits()

Plots all observations for each transit in single figure.

plot_observations()

Plots ra and dec of all observations

plot_orbits()

Plots sun and orbits of planets and asteroid

plot_transit(index)

Plots observations in specific transit, specified by index in transits array.

Parameters

index (int) – index of transits array

query_mpc()

Queries MPC for all orbit data

Returns

All orbit data in form of dict

Return type

dict

query_observations()

Queries gaiadr2.sso_observation for all observations for specific asteroid object. Adds observations attribute

Returns

Table of results from query job including source_id, observation_id,

number_mp, epoch, ra, dec, x_gaia, y_gaia, z_gaia

Return type

Table

query_source(search_col)

Queries gaiadr2.sso_source for asteroid given number_mp, denomination, or source_id.

Parameters

search_col (string) – Specifies which column name to query by. Either ‘number_mp’, ‘denomination’, or ‘source_id’

Returns

Table of results from query job including source_id, num_of_obs, number_mp, denomination

Return type

Table

set_sso_source(sso_source_results)

Sets attributes of Asteroid object from results of querying gaiadr2.sso_source

Parameters

sso_source_results (Table) – Table of results from query job for gaia.sso_source. Includes source_id, num_of_obs, number_mp, denomination. If table is empty, does not intialize attributes.

Returns

Table of results from query job including source_id, num_of_obs, number_mp, denomination

Return type

Table

set_transits()

Adds transits and transit_ccds attributes from total observations

Returns

Array of int, individual transits from observations

Return type

ndarray

asteroidal.asteroid.orbit(ax, orbit_params, color, olabel, lw=1, alp=1)

Plots simple orbit of object given semimajor axis and eccentricity in polar coordinates.

Parameters

  • ax (axes) – Axes to plot onto

  • orbit_params (ndarray) – Orbit parameters (semimajor axis, eccentricity)

  • color (string) – Color of orbit plot

  • olabel (string) – Label of orbit as seen in legend

  • lw (float) – Linewidth of orbit plot

  • a (float within 0-1) – Alpha value of orbit plot

asteroidal.asteroid.planet_orbit(ax)

Plots sun and orbits of planets

Parameters

ax (axes) – Axes to plot onto

asteroidal.asteroid.plot_multiple_orbits(asteroids)

Plots orbit of multiple asteroids in array along with sun and planets

Parameters

asteroids (ndarray of Asteroid object) – Array of asteroid objects
